name: PKPaymentButtonType
desc: The Apple Pay button types you can display to initiate Apple Pay transactions.

items.name: case plain
items.desc: An Apple Pay button with the Apple Pay logo only, useful when an additional call to action isn't needed.

items.name: case buy
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for product purchases.

items.name: case addMoney
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for adding money to a card, account, or payment system.

items.name: case book
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for booking trips, flights, or other experiences.

items.name: case checkout
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for purchase experiences that include other payment buttons that start with “Check out”.

items.name: case `continue`
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for general purchases.

items.name: case contribute
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful to help people contribute money to projects, causes, organizations, and other entities.

items.name: case donate
items.desc: An Apple Pay button used by approved nonprofit organization that lets people make donations.

items.name: case inStore
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for paying bills or invoices.

items.name: case order
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for placing orders for such as like meals or flowers.

items.name: case reload
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for adding money to a card, account, or payment system.

items.name: case rent
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for renting items such as cars or scooters.

items.name: case setUp
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for prompting the user to set up a card.

items.name: case subscribe
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for purchasing a subscription such as a gym membership or meal-kit delivery service.

items.name: case support
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful supporting people give money to projects, causes, organizations, and other entities.

items.name: case tip
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful useful for letting people tip for goods or services.

items.name: case topUp
items.desc: An Apple Pay button useful for adding money to a card, account, or payment system.
